mesquite.categ.lib

Class DNAState

  • java.lang.Object
    • mesquite.lib.characters.CharacterState
      • mesquite.categ.lib.CategoricalState
        • mesquite.categ.lib.MolecularState
          • mesquite.categ.lib.DNAState
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    RNAState

    public class DNAState
extends MolecularState
    A subclass of CategoricalState set for DNA (max state enforced at 3).
